channel.title: EasyRSC - editing ItemLoc.xml file -> error compiling
channel.description:
First of all, I ain't coder or trying to become one. Im just trying to remind good old days playing rsc with few friends.
OK, everything works with fine when I won't edit anything. So I go to conf - server - locs and open up itemloc.xml with notepad. I didn't add any new lines, just edited ID values and coords. I added 6 new items to edgeville - they are first item x - 219 y - 455, second item x - 218 y - 455 etc. Next I deleted compressed ItemLoc.xml.gz, right click on ItemLoc.xml file and compress(using winrar), I changed also ItemLoc.xml.gz (as all other compressed files on Locs folder) and copy/pasted it into Locs folder(same places as all others).
It seems to compile well ...BUT, when I run server, it gives me error and won't open GUI.
Any ideas? What should I try?
-Desty.
Figured it out.
Winrar didn't compress it correctly. I downloaded 7z and now compiles and runs successfully. Thank you.

item.title: EasyRSC - editing ItemLoc.xml file -> error compiling
item.dc:creator: @Desteny Desteny
item.description:
@Desteny wrote:

First of all, I ain’t coder or trying to become one. Im just trying to remind good old days playing rsc with few friends.

OK,
everything works with fine when I won’t edit anything. So I go to conf - server - locs and open up itemloc.xml with notepad. I didn’t add any new lines, just edited ID values and coords. I added 6 new items to edgeville - they are first item x - 219 y - 455, second item x - 218 y - 455 etc.
Next I deleted compressed ItemLoc.xml.gz, right click on ItemLoc.xml file and compress(using winrar), I changed also ItemLoc.xml.gz (as all other compressed files on Locs folder) and copy/pasted it into Locs folder(same places as all others).

It seems to compile well …BUT, when I run server, it gives me error and won’t open GUI.

Any ideas? What should I try?

-Desty.

Figured it out.

Winrar didn’t compress it correctly. I downloaded 7z and now compiles and runs successfully.
Thank you.
